summary: Frontend-only testing completed for Portfolio section feature. All 11 features tested and passed successfully.
critical_code_review_comments: Project data is stored in local JS file (projects.js) - MOCKED data source, not from backend API
context_for_next_testing_agent: Portfolio section fully functional. Routes /projects and /projects/:slug working. All 22 projects displayed with proper data-testid attributes. Featured badges, hover effects, navigation, and related projects all working correctly.

navigation.nav_portfolio_link: PASS - Shows 'Portfolio' text and highlights cyan when on /projects pages

all_projects_page.all_22_projects_displayed: PASS - All 22 project cards rendered in grid
all_projects_page.featured_badges: PASS - 5 featured badges displayed (PocketFiler, PK.Page, Gaya Blockchain, Evox Network, App Studio Pro)
all_projects_page.hover_effects: PASS - Image scales up and external link icon appears on hover

project_detail_page.project_info_displayed: PASS - Title, category, description, tags, year, platform, industry, services all displayed
project_detail_page.related_projects_section: PASS - Shows projects from same industry/tags (3-4 related projects)
project_detail_page.project_not_found: PASS - Shows 'Project Not Found' page for invalid slugs

mocked_apis.projects_data: Project data stored in /app/frontend/src/data/projects.js - static JS file, not from backend API
